Package it.polimi.ingsw.rmi

package it.polimi.ingsw.rmi
Contains the RMI remotable service interfaces for controllers, updaters and HeartbeatHandler, as well as the necessary adapters to conform to those interfaces and the RmiConnectionController entrypoint, which will be bound by the server in a Registry and used by the clients to establish an RMI connection
See Also:
  • it.polimi.ingsw.controller
  • it.polimi.ingsw.updater
  • HeartbeatHandler
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw
     
  • Class
    Description
    RmiAdapter
    Adapter base class to adapt RMI interfaces with their RemoteExceptions to the more generic network interfaces, which instead declare DisconnectedExceptions
    RmiAdapter.RmiRunnable
    Runnable interface which can throw RemoteExceptions
    RmiAdapter.RmiSupplier<T>
    Supplier interface which can throw RemoteExceptions
    RmiConnectionController
    RMI remotable service clients can use to establish a connection with the server
    RmiConnectionController.ConnectedController
    RMI remotable service exclusive to a single authenticated client which can be used by said client to join games
    RmiGameController
    RMI remotable service which will be used to implement GameController This re-declares the same methods, but with an RMI compatible signature, throwing RemoteException instead o DisconnectedException.
    RmiGameController.Adapter
     
    RmiGameUpdater
    RMI remotable service which will be used to implement GameUpdater This re-declares the same methods, but with an RMI compatible signature, throwing RemoteException instead o DisconnectedException.
    RmiGameUpdater.Adapter
     
    RmiHeartbeatHandler
    RMI remotable service which will be used to implement HeartbeatHandler This re-declares the same methods, but with an RMI compatible signature, throwing RemoteException instead o DisconnectedException.
    RmiHeartbeatHandler.Adapter
     
    RmiLobbyController
    RMI remotable service which will be used to implement LobbyController This re-declares the same methods, but with an RMI compatible signature, throwing RemoteException instead o DisconnectedException.
    RmiLobbyController.Adapter
     
    RmiLobbyUpdater
    RMI remotable service which will be used to implement LobbyUpdater This re-declares the same methods, but with an RMI compatible signature, throwing RemoteException instead o DisconnectedException.
    RmiLobbyUpdater.Adapter
     
    RmiLobbyUpdaterFactory
    RMI remotable service which will be used to implement LobbyUpdaterFactory This re-declares the same methods, but with an RMI compatible signature, throwing RemoteException instead o DisconnectedException.
    RmiLobbyUpdaterFactory.Adapter
     
    RMITimeoutClientSocketFactory
    Client socket factory which respects the "sun.rmi.transport.tcp.readTimeout" system property in order to properly timeout on socket connection
    UnicastRemoteObjects
    Utilities to work with RMI UnicastRemoteObjects
    UnicastRemoteObjects.Exporter
    Interface used to export remote objects in a consistent way across the whole application
    UnicastRemoteObjects.TrackingExporter
    Interface used to export remote objects which also tracks which object have been exported and allows bulk-unexporting them
